question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/dynamic_calculator.move] [Function: dynamic_user_health_loan_value()] [Negative Balance] If is_increase is false and estimate_value exceeds actual loan balance in dynamic_user_loan_value (line 145), can this cause underflow resulting in massive apparent debt?
